name: UIPrintInteractionController
desc: A user interface that manages the printing of documents, images, and other printable content in iOS.

items.name: class var shared: UIPrintInteractionController
items.desc: Returns the shared print-interaction controller object.

items.name: var delegate: UIPrintInteractionControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate of the print-interaction controller.

items.name: protocol UIPrintInteractionControllerDelegate
items.desc: An optional set of methods that the delegate of the shared print-interaction controller implements.

items.name: class var isPrintingAvailable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the device supports printing.

items.name: class func canPrint(Data) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether UIKit can print the contents of a data object.

items.name: class func canPrint(URL) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether UIKit can print the file that the specified URL references.

items.name: class var printableUTIs: Set<String>
items.desc: Returns a set of the Uniform Type Identifiers for the types of data that UIKit can print.

items.name: var printingItem: Any?
items.desc: A single ready-to-print object.

items.name: var printingItems: [Any]?
items.desc: An array of ready-to-print objects.

items.name: var printPageRenderer: UIPrintPageRenderer?
items.desc: An object that draws pages of printable content when UIKit requests it.

items.name: var printFormatter: UIPrintFormatter?
items.desc: An object that lays out the content of pages according to the kind of content.

items.name: func present(animated: Bool, completionHandler: UIPrintInteractionController.CompletionHandler?) -> Bool
items.desc: Presents the iPhone printing user interface in a sheet, optionally animating it to slide up from the bottom of the screen.

items.name: func present(from: UIBarButtonItem, animated: Bool, completionHandler: UIPrintInteractionController.CompletionHandler?) -> Bool
items.desc: Presents the iPad printing user interface in a popover view, optionally animating it from a bar-button item.

items.name: func present(from: CGRect, in: UIView, animated: Bool, completionHandler: UIPrintInteractionController.CompletionHandler?) -> Bool
items.desc: Presents the iPad printing user interface in a popover view, optionally animating it from any area in a view.

items.name: func dismiss(animated: Bool)
items.desc: Dismisses the printing-options sheet or popover.

items.name: func print(to: UIPrinter, completionHandler: UIPrintInteractionController.CompletionHandler?) -> Bool
items.desc: Prints directly to the specified printer.

items.name: typealias UIPrintInteractionController.CompletionHandler
items.desc: A completion handler for responding to the completion of a print job or for handling printing errors.

items.name: var printInfo: UIPrintInfo?
items.desc: An object that encapsulates information about the print job.

items.name: var printPaper: UIPrintPaper?
items.desc: An object that represents the paper size and printing area for the print job.

items.name: var showsNumberOfCopies: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the printing options include the number of copies.

items.name: var showsPaperSelectionForLoadedPapers: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the paper selection menu displays.

items.name: let UIPrintErrorDomain: String
items.desc: The string constant that defines the UIKit printing error domain.

items.name: struct UIPrintError
items.desc: A structure that contains information about a printing error.

items.name: enum UIPrintError.Code
items.desc: Constants that specify the print error code.
